partial_orders.reason: Both edits perform an identical structural transformation on the same type of code construct. They both replace a conditional expression `linecache.getline(filename, lineno).strip() if line is None else line` with an equivalent if-statement followed by a strip() call. This is a uniform refactoring pattern applied to two similar functions (`idle_formatwarning` and `idle_formatwarning_subproc`) that have nearly identical implementations. The edits represent a synchronized bulk substitution where the same before→after pattern is applied to the same type of syntactic construct (conditional line processing logic). Either edit could be made first as part of this refactoring sweep, and after making one, the other would be the natural next step to maintain consistency.
